gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，我昨天忘了帶鑰匙了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Oh no, I forgot to bring my keys yesterday.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, wǒ zuótiān wàngle dài yàoshi le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，天氣真糟糕。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Oh, the weather is really bad.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, tiānqì zhēn zāogāo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，現在的年輕人都太依賴手機了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Sigh, young people nowadays rely too much on their mobile phones.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, xiànzài de niánqīngrén dōu tài yīlài shǒujī le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，我好想念我的家鄉。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Ah, I miss my hometown so much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, wǒ hǎo xiǎngniàn wǒ de jiāxiāng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，現在的物價真的越來越高了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Alas, the prices of goods nowadays are really getting higher and higher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, xiànzài de wùjià zhēn de yuè lái yuè gāo le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 家長應該愛護孩子的安全。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Parents should protect their children's safety.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Jiāzhǎng yīnggāi àihù háizi de ānquán.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛護環境，不要隨便亂丟垃圾。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should protect the environment and not litter randomly.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àihù huánjìng, bùyào suíbiàn luàn diū lājī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 學校提倡學生愛護公物，不要隨意破壞。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The school encourages students to take care of public property and not to damage it at will.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xuéxiào tíchàng xuéshēng àihù gōngwù, bùyào suíyì pòhuài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 志願者們每天都在愛護流浪動物。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Volunteers take care of stray animals every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhìyuànzhěmen měitiān dōu zài àihù liúlàng dòngwù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛護我們的文化遺產，不要隨便毀壞。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should protect our cultural heritage and not destroy it casually.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àihù wǒmen de wénhuà yíchǎn, bùyào suíbiàn huǐhuài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛惜我們的環境。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should cherish our environment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àixī wǒmen de huánjìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書是我非常愛惜的寶貝。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This book is a treasure that I cherish very much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū shì wǒ fēicháng àixī de bǎobèi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛惜大自然的資源。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should treasure the resources of nature.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àixī dàzìrán de zīyuán.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 愛惜時間，珍惜每一刻。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Cherish time, treasure every moment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Àixī shíjiān, zhēnxī měi yī kè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她非常愛惜她的健康。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She cherishes her health very much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā fēicháng àixī tā de jiànkāng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他有一顆善良的愛心。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He has a kind heart.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yǒu yī kē shànliáng de àixīn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該用愛心對待他人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should treat others with love and compassion.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi yòng àixīn duìdài tārén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 捐款是一個表達愛心的方式。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Donating money is a way to show compassion.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Juānkuǎn shì yī gè biǎodá àixīn de fāngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 學生們對他們的老師充滿了愛心。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The students have a lot of love for their teacher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xuéshēngmen duì tāmen de lǎoshī chōngmǎnle àixīn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 有愛心的人總是樂於助人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: People with a loving heart are always willing to help others.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yǒu àixīn de rén zǒng shì lèyú zhùrén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我會用溫暖的話語來安慰她。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I will use comforting words to console her.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ huì yòng wēnnuǎn de huàyǔ lái ānwèi tā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們到醫院去安慰病人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They went to the hospital to comfort the patients.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen dào yīyuàn qù ānwèi bìngrén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 在困難的時候，朋友的安慰很重要。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: During difficult times, the comfort of friends is important.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zài kùnnan de shíhou, péngyǒu de ānwèi hěn zhòngyào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的話語安慰了我受傷的心靈。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her words comforted my wounded soul.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de huàyǔ ānwèi le wǒ shòushāng de xīnlíng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我知道該如何安慰傷心的人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I know how to console someone who is heartbroken.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zhīdào gāi rúhé ānwèi shāngxīn de rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請問這個電視怎麼安裝？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Excuse me, how do you install this television?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐngwèn zhège diànshì zěnme ānzhuāng?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要找人來安裝空調。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to find someone to install the air conditioning.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào zhǎo rén lái ānzhuāng kōngtiáo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 安裝這個軟體需要一些時間。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: It takes some time to install this software.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Ānzhuāng zhège ruǎntǐ xūyào yīxiē shíjiān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我剛剛安裝了一個新的應用程式。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I just installed a new application.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ gānggāng ānzhuāngle yīgè xīn de yìngyòng chéngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們會幫你在家裡安裝網路。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They will help you install the internet at home.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen huì bāng nǐ zài jiālǐ ānzhuāng wǎnglù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 小船停在岸邊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The small boat stopped at the shore.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xiǎo chuán tíng zài àn biān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他站在河岸上看風景。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He stood on the riverbank and admired the scenery.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zhàn zài hé àn shàng kàn fēngjǐng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他游過去到對岸。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He swam across to the other side of the shore.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yóu guòqù dào duì'àn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡坐在海岸上看日出。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I enjoy sitting on the coast and watching the sunrise.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zuò zài hǎi'àn shàng kàn rìchū.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 傍晚時分，他們漫步在湖岸邊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In the evening, they took a stroll along the lakeshore.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bàngwǎn shí fēn, tāmen mànbù zài hú'àn biān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他非常把握自己的未來。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is very confident about his future.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā fēicháng bǎwò zìjǐ de wèilái.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要把握這個機會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to grasp this opportunity.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào bǎwò zhège jīhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你能把握住這個問題的關鍵嗎？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Can you grasp the key to this problem?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ néng bǎwò zhù zhège wèntí de guānjiàn ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該把握住學習的機會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should take advantage of the opportunity to learn.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎwò zhù xuéxí de jīhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 要成功，你必須把握好每個機會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: To succeed, you must seize every opportunity.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yào chénggōng, nǐ bìxū bǎwò hǎo měi gè jīhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他把書擺在桌子上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He put the book on the table.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ shū bǎi zài zhuōzi shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她把菜擺在盤子裡。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She arranged the food on the plate.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ cài bǎi zài pánzi lǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡把家裡打掃乾淨再擺張桌子。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to clean the house and then set up a table.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan bǎ jiālǐ dǎsǎo gānjìng zài bǎi zhāng zhuōzi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 媽媽把花瓶擺在窗前。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Mom put the vase in front of the window.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Māmā bǎ huāpíng bǎi zài chuāng qián.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 明年我想把房間的擺設改變一下。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Next year, I want to change the arrangement of the room.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngnián wǒ xiǎng bǎ fángjiān de bǎishè gǎibiàn yīxià.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們的班主任很嚴格。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Our class teacher is very strict.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen de bānzhǔrèn hěn yángé.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 班主任給我們上了一堂有趣的課。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The class teacher gave us an interesting lesson.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bānzhǔrèn gěi wǒmen shàng le yī táng yǒuqù de kè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 班主任負責管理學生的學習和生活。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The class teacher is responsible for managing students' learning and life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bānzhǔrèn fùzé guǎnlǐ xuéshēng de xuéxí hé shēnghuó.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我非常感謝我們的班主任對我們的關心和幫助。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am very grateful for the care and help from our class teacher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ fēicháng gǎnxiè wǒmen de bānzhǔrèn duì wǒmen de guānxīn hé bāngzhù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 班主任在我們的成長過程中起著重要的作用。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The class teacher plays an important role in our growth process.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bānzhǔrèn zài wǒmen de chéngzhǎng guòchéng zhōng qǐ zhe zhòngyào de zuòyòng.
